title: What are the techniques for strong somnambulism and moving therapy, and how can they be used for self-hypnosis and past-life regression?
first_phrase: In this text, the author introduces various hypnosis techniques and their applications. The last part focuses on different methods, including the Trabona method, Modified Akstein method, and Moving Therapy, to help achieve a deep state of somnambulism and self-hypnosis. The author also explains how to deal with burn out and work on problems using laying of hands, magnetic points, and fluidification. Additionally, the author introduces the concept of focusing on clients' problems and using hypnodrama to bring two halves together. The text also covers exercises to improve presence, introduces different types of people based on earth, fire, water, and air, and discusses muscular preferences and how magnetic passes can change them.

last_phrase: In conclusion, this five-day workshop has covered a variety of techniques and exercises to develop self-awareness and promote personal growth. From developing presence through external exercises to exploring symbols of Hermeticism, Quantum physics and Enneagram, this workshop has provided a comprehensive understanding for attendees to work on their past life experiences to solve current problems. Techniques such as self-hypnosis with water, magnetic passes for weight loss, and the crossed breathing technique for fast release have also been demonstrated to help individuals achieve their desired goals. Overall, this workshop has equipped participants with a range of practical tools to improve their physical, emotional and psychological well-being.
